articles.author: Adam Schrader
articles.title: China imposes exit bans on Wells Fargo banker, U.S. government worker - upi.com
articles.description: China is preventing a Chinese American banker for Wells Fargo and, separately, an employee of the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office from leaving the country.
articles.content: July 20 (UPI) -- The Chinese government is preventing a Chinese American banker for Wells Fargo and, separately, an employee of the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office from leaving the country, reports … [+1582 chars]
